text: The Ambassador of Malaysia to the Argentine Republic is the head of Malaysia's diplomatic mission to Argentina. The position has the rank and status of an Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary and is based in the Embassy of Malaysia, Buenos Aires. ==List of heads of mission== ===Ambassadors to Argentina=== {| class=wikitable ! Ignatius || 1996 || 1999 |- | M. title: List of ambassadors of Malaysia to Argentina
